scripts.test: npx newman run ./tests/airbnb-listings/api.json -e ./tests/airbnb-listings/environments/local.json && npx newman run ./tests/global-food-prices/GLOBAL-FOOD-PRICES-API-LOCAL.postman_collection.json -e ./tests/global-food-prices/environments/sos.postman_environment.json && npx newman run ./tests/world-consumption-of-drinking-water-data/apijota.json -e ./tests/world-consumption-of-drinking-water-data/environments/local.json
